title: Please help me.
body:
Basically every game arround the 20 minute mark my game freezes and crashes its always arround the same time internet stays ( i stay discord etc. )
i done repair resetting ip vie strg + r commands etc. still i cant find a sollution i googled it but i didnt find anything related to that does anyone has a clue? would be nice

with kind regards

suresun

replies.body:
well its arround 20 minutes 18-21 ish but most of the time 19:30-20:15ish

someone suggested that maybe i would have to get a new ip from my router which is giving out random generated ips so i force dc and reconnected via cmd windows command ( didnt fixed it just to make that clear)

idk if its a corrupted file since i ran the repair tool and i have the dcs in aram and all rotating game modes aswell

thanks for the answer btw!

It's always around the 20 min mark? Sounds like there might be some corrupted files pertaining to Baron, since that's the time that he spawns. Try running a repair through the game client options if you haven't yet, not really sure what "repair resetting ip vie strg + r commands" is referring to.
